reviewText: this movie was soooo funny, even my husband who doesn't understand German much laughed. We ended up watching the movie three times

This movie is hugely funny--and the subtitles are much better than a dub-over as the original German adds a lot to the mood whether you understand the language or not.  Keep in mind this is a European (Region II) version and that Region I is not currently available so be sure your DVD player or PC can use it
